## aads apps search

Search for iOS apps

```
aads apps search [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --all                 Fetch all pages
  -h, --help                help for search
      --limit int           Max results
      --offset int          Start offset
      --query string        Search query
      --return-owned-apps   Only return owned apps
```
